summary:
Oh, I\\\'m so fucked up about this old look of the Guard\\\'s Shields.
I searched for a mod on the Nexus, but there are just better and brighter colours for them. No mod that the Shields are full coloured.
So i did it by myself, and the result is...
descriptionHtml:
...awesome.

The Screenshots and Images are explaining the mod better than I could ever do. So look!
(Left Side = NEW look; Right Side = Old Look)

This Mod is Multilanguage: Every Language of Skyrim is supported.
The Mod will have conflicts with other Guard-Shield-retexture or guard shield mods.

Installation: With NMM (There will be no File at \"Plugins\" if you activate the mod) or copy the 
                  included meshes-folder to Skyrim\\Data.
Uninstallation: Delete the \"*******symbol\"-Files in  the Folder: Skyrim\\Data\\meshes\\armors\\stormcloaks

Check out my other retexture-modsy!
Guard Weapons - Set: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34470
Guard Weapons - Bows: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34409
Guard Weapons - Daggers: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34426
Guard Weapons - Swords: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34382

Endorse, if you like it!
author: GGinddi
